ktfx
0.2
search in API
ktfx-controlsfx-layouts/ktfx.controlsfx.layouts

Package-level declarations

Types

KtfxHiddenSidesPane
Link copied to clipboard
open class KtfxHiddenSidesPane : HiddenSidesPane, NodeContainer

HiddenSidesPane with dynamic-layout dsl support. Invoking dsl will only set its content.

KtfxInfoOverlay
Link copied to clipboard
open class KtfxInfoOverlay(graphic: Node?, text: String?) : InfoOverlay, NodeContainer

InfoOverlay with dynamic-layout dsl support. Invoking dsl will only set its content.

KtfxMasterDetailPane
Link copied to clipboard
open class KtfxMasterDetailPane(detailSide: Side, showDetail: Boolean) : MasterDetailPane, NodeContainer

MasterDetailPane with dynamic-layout dsl support. Invoking dsl will only set its master and detail, in order.

KtfxNotificationPane
Link copied to clipboard
open class KtfxNotificationPane : NotificationPane, NodeContainer

NotificationPane with dynamic-layout dsl support. Invoking dsl will only set its content.

KtfxSegmentedButton
Link copied to clipboard
open class KtfxSegmentedButton : SegmentedButton, ToggleButtonContainer

SegmentedButton with dynamic-layout dsl support. Invoking dsl will add its children.

KtfxSnapshotView
Link copied to clipboard
open class KtfxSnapshotView : SnapshotView, NodeContainer

SnapshotView with dynamic-layout dsl support. Invoking dsl will only set its node.
